00002  * @brief   Balanced traveling salesman problem double threshold algorithm.
00003  *
00004  * Heuristic for solving the balanced traveling salesman problem double
00005  * threshold algorithm (BalTSP DT-Algorithm).

00007  * @author  John LaRusic

00016 /****************************************************************************
00017  * Private function prototypes

00019 /**
00020  *  @brief  Determines if a tour is feasible given min/max costs based upon
00021  *          lower bounds for the BTSP.
00022  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00023  *  @param  min_cost [in] min_cost to consider for active edges
00024  *  @param  max_cost [in] max_cost to consider for active edges
00025  *  @param  is_feasible [out] ARROW_TRUE if tour feasibly could exist
00026  */
00027 int balanced_lb_feasible(arrow_problem *problem, int min_cost, int max_cost, 
00028                          int *is_feasible);

00031 /****************************************************************************
00032  * Public function implementations
00033  ****************************************************************************/
00034 int 
00035 arrow_balanced_tsp_dt(arrow_problem *problem, 
00036                       arrow_problem_info *info,
00037                       arrow_btsp_params *params, 
00038                       int lb_only, int with_improvements,
00039                       arrow_bound_result *lb_result,
00040                       arrow_btsp_result *tour_result)
00041 {
00042     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00043     int is_feasible = ARROW_FALSE;
00044     int i, low, high;
00045     int best_lb_low, best_lb_high;
00046     int best_tour_low, best_tour_high;
00047     int low_val, high_val, max;
00048     int best_gap, cur_gap;
00049     double start_time, end_time;
00050     arrow_problem asym_problem;
00051     arrow_problem *solve_problem;
00052     arrow_btsp_result cur_tour_result;
00053     
00054     /* Print out debug information */
00055     arrow_debug("LB Only? %s\n", (lb_only ? "Yes" : "No"));
00056     arrow_debug("With Improvements? %s\n", (with_improvements ? "Yes" : "No"));
00057     arrow_debug("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", params->lower_bound);
00058     arrow_debug("Initial Upper Bound: %d\n", params->upper_bound);
00059     if(params->num_steps > 0)
00060     {
00061         arrow_debug("Total solve steps: %d\n", params->num_steps);
00062     }
00063     arrow_debug("\n");
00064     
00065     /* Determine if we need to convert a symmetric instance into an asymmetric instance */
00066     solve_problem = problem;
00067     if(!problem->symmetric)
00068     {
00069         if(!arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp(params->deep_copy, problem, params->infinity, &asym_problem))
00070         {
00071             arrow_print_error("Could not create symmetric transformation.");
00072             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00073         }
00074         solve_problem = &asym_problem;
00075     }
00076     
00077     /* Setup result structures */
00078     arrow_btsp_result_init(solve_problem, &cur_tour_result);
00079     tour_result->optimal = ARROW_FALSE;
00080     tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00081     tour_result->total_time = 0.0;
00082     tour_result->bin_search_steps = 0;
00083     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00084     {
00085         tour_result->solver_attempts[i] = 0;
00086         tour_result->solver_time[i] = 0.0;
00087     }
00088     lb_result->total_time = 0.0;
00089     
00090     /* Find low/high values */
00091     low = 0; best_lb_low = 0; best_tour_low = 0;
00092     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->lower_bound, &high))
00093     {
00094         arrow_debug("Could not find lower_bound in cost_list\n");
00095         arrow_debug(" - Using high = 0\n");
00096         high = 0;
00097     }    
00098     best_lb_high = info->max_cost;
00099     best_tour_high = info->max_cost;
00100 
00101     if(params->upper_bound == INT_MAX)
00102         params->upper_bound = info->max_cost;
00103 
00104     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->upper_bound, &max))
00105     {
00106         arrow_debug("Could not find upper_bound in cost_list\n");
00107         arrow_debug(" - Using max_cost = %d\n", info->max_cost);
00108         max = info->cost_list_length - 1;
00109     }
00110     
00111     printf("low = %d; high = %d; max = %d\n", low, high, max);
00112     
00113     /* Main loop */
00114     arrow_debug("Starting balanced search [%d,%d]\n", params->lower_bound, params->upper_bound);
00115     while((low <= high) && (high < info->cost_list_length))
00116     {        
00117         low_val = info->cost_list[low];
00118         high_val = info->cost_list[high];
00119         printf("%d <= C[i,j] <= %d: ", low_val, high_val);
00120         
00121         if(with_improvements)
00122         {
00123             if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low + params->upper_bound <= high_val)
00124             {
00125                 arrow_debug("Tour is heuristically optimal.\n");
00126                 if(low > max) arrow_debug("low > max: quit search!\n");
00127                 break;
00128             }
00129         }
00130         if(low > max)
00131         {
00132             arrow_debug("low > max: quit search!\n");
00133             break;
00134         }
00135         
00136         tour_result->bin_search_steps++;
00137         
00138         /* First check if lower bounds are feasible */
00139         start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00140         if(!balanced_lb_feasible(problem, low_val, high_val, &is_feasible))
00141         {
00142             arrow_debug("Error checking lower bound feasibility\n");
00143             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00144             goto CLEANUP;
00145         }
00146         end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00147         lb_result->total_time += end_time - start_time;
00148         
00149         /* If the lower bounds check out, then ask feasibility question */
00150         if(is_feasible)
00151         {
00152             if(high_val - low_val < best_lb_high - best_lb_low)
00153             {
00154                 best_lb_low = low_val;
00155                 best_lb_high = high_val;
00156             }
00157             
00158             if(!lb_only)
00159             {
00160                 arrow_debug("LB is feasible, now trying to find a tour...\n");
00161                 start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00162                 if(!arrow_btsp_feasible(solve_problem, params->num_steps, params->steps,
00163                                         low_val, high_val, &is_feasible, &cur_tour_result))
00164                 {
00165                     arrow_debug("Error checking tour feasibility\n");
00166                     ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00167                     goto CLEANUP;
00168                 }
00169                 end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00170                 tour_result->total_time += end_time - start_time;
00171                 
00172                 for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00173                 {
00174                     tour_result->solver_attempts[i] += cur_tour_result.solver_attempts[i];
00175                     tour_result->solver_time[i] += cur_tour_result.solver_time[i];
00176                 }
00177             }
00178         }
00179         
00180         if(is_feasible)
00181         {
00182             if(lb_only)
00183             {
00184                 arrow_debug("LB is feasible\n");
00185                 low++;
00186             }
00187             else
00188             {
00189                 arrow_debug("Found a feasible tour!\n");
00190                 
00191                 best_gap = best_tour_high - best_tour_low;
00192                 cur_gap = cur_tour_result.max_cost - cur_tour_result.min_cost; 
00193                 
00194                 if(cur_gap < best_gap)
00195                 {
00196                     arrow_debug("Tour is better than the current best solution.\n");
00197                     
00198                     /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00199                     tour_result->min_cost = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00200                     tour_result->max_cost = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00201                     tour_result->tour_length = cur_tour_result.tour_length;
00202                 
00203                     if(tour_result->tour != NULL)
00204                     {
00205                         tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00206                         if(problem->symmetric)
00207                         {
00208                             for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00209                                 tour_result->tour[i] = cur_tour_result.tour[i];
00210                         }
00211                         else
00212                         {
00213                             arrow_util_sbtsp_to_abstp_tour(solve_problem, cur_tour_result.tour, 
00214                                                            tour_result->tour);
00215                             tour_result->tour_length += problem->size * params->infinity;
00216                         }
00217                     }
00218             
00219                     best_tour_low = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00220                     best_tour_high = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00221                     
00222                     while(tour_result->min_cost >= info->cost_list[low])
00223                         low++;
00224                 }
00225                 else
00226                 {
00227                     arrow_debug("Found tour is no better than current best\n");
00228                     low++;
00229                 }
00230             }
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234             if(!lb_only) printf("No tour can be found.\n");
00235             
00236             high++;
00237             
00238             if(lb_only)
00239                 best_gap = best_lb_high - best_lb_low;
00240             else
00241                 best_gap = best_tour_high - best_tour_low;
00242             
00243             if(with_improvements)
00244             {
00245                 while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] >= best_gap)
00246                     low++;
00247             }
00248         }
00249         
00250         if(!lb_only) arrow_debug("\n");
00251     }
00252     
00253     arrow_debug("\n");
00254     
00255     lb_result->obj_value = best_lb_high - best_lb_low;
00256 
00257 CLEANUP:
00258     if(!problem->symmetric)
00259         arrow_problem_destruct(&asym_problem);
00260     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&cur_tour_result);
00261     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00262 }
00263 
00264 int balanced_lb_feasible(arrow_problem *problem, int min_cost, int max_cost, 
00265                          int *is_feasible)
00266 {
00267     *is_feasible = ARROW_FALSE;
00268         
00269     if(!arrow_bbssp_biconnected(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00270     {
00271         printf("Could not solve BBSSP for balanced LB.\n");
00272         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00273     }
00274     if(!*is_feasible)
00275     {
00276         printf("BBSSP is infeasible.\n");
00277         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00278     }
00279 
00280     if(!arrow_bap_has_assignment(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00281     {
00282         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BAP for balanced LB\n");
00283         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00284     }
00285     if(!*is_feasible)
00286     {
00287         printf("BAP is infeasible.\n");
00288         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00289     }
00290 
00291     if(!problem->symmetric)
00292     {
00293         if(!arrow_bscssp_connected(problem, min_cost, max_cost, is_feasible))
00294         {
00295             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BSCSSP for balanced LB\n");
00296             return ARROW_FAILURE;
00297         }
00298         if(!*is_feasible)
00299         {
00300             printf("BSCSSP is infeasible.\n");
00301             return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00302         }
00303     }
00304     
00305     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00306 }
